gold.user: User wants to create a new stream for a specific call to send audio to a participant.
gold.ideal: Create a stream for the call identified by CallSid under the account specified by AccountSid.

gold.user: User needs to update an existing stream to change its parameters, such as audio source or participant.
gold.ideal: Update the stream identified by Sid for the call specified by CallSid under the account specified by AccountSid.
